definitions.definition: An action performed on a regular basis .
examples: It’s become a habit of mine to have a cup of coffee after dinner.

definitions.definition: An action performed repeatedly and automatically , usually without awareness .
examples: By force of habit , he dressed for work even though it was holiday.

main_definition: An action performed on a regular basis .
secondary_definitions: An action performed repeatedly and automatically , usually without awareness .

definitions.definition: A long piece of clothing worn by monks and nuns .
examples: It’s interesting how Catholic and Buddhist monks both wear habits .

definitions.definition: A piece of clothing worn for a specific activity; a uniform .
examples: The new riding habits of the team looked smashing!

definitions.definition: Form of growth or general appearance and structure of a plant or crystal .

main_definition: A long piece of clothing worn by monks and nuns .
secondary_definitions: A piece of clothing worn for a specific activity; a uniform .
( botany , mineralogy ) Form of growth or general appearance and structure of a plant or crystal .
